item.title: The day I leave WordPress
item.description:
I’ve been using WordPress as my primary blogging system for almost 10 years. And today, I have to say goodbye to it.

And this is a test for the math $a^2+b^2=c^2$.

item.title: Overwrite folders in FTP
item.description:
I’m not hosting my main blog on GitHub instead, I need to host it on my old WordPress space.

However, because I can’t simply modify and upload my entire site like with Git, so I have to figure out a way of wiping the entire public_html folder and then upload the site entirely (painful, painful, and bye bye, pictures, well, maybe a little pictures).

Anyway, this is the solution so far

scp -r mydir username@example.com:destdir
